name: kuching-art-online-system
description: End-to-end tests for Kuching ART Online System

scripts.test:ci: npm run serve & sleep 3 && npm test && kill %1
scripts.demo:quick: playwright test tests/integrated-demo.test.js --grep="Page loads correctly" --project="Microsoft Edge" --headed
scripts.demo:complete: playwright test tests/integrated-demo.test.js --grep="six core scenarios" --project="Microsoft Edge" --headed
scripts.demo:report: playwright test tests/integrated-demo.test.js --project="Microsoft Edge" && playwright show-report

author: Your Name
